author: dildick
body:
Code checks is required for pull requests #19986, #19786 and #19780. Because they have been pending for too long already, I don't want to modify the existing PRs and further delay integration. Rather I merged all three in and applied `code-checks` here. @smuzaffar This should be sufficient.
This pull request needs to be merged **after** #19986, #19786 and #19780 are merged. After each merge I will rebase this one.
title: Code checks for PR19986, PR19786 and PR19780
